statements: SELECT * FROM encrypted_user_data;
SELECT username, encrypted_email FROM encrypted_user_data WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, username, encrypted_email FROM encrypted_user_data ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT * FROM encrypted_user_data WHERE encrypted_email LIKE '%@gmail.com%';
SELECT user_id, encrypted_password FROM encrypted_user_data WHERE user_id > 3 ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT username, encrypted_email FROM encrypted_user_data WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM encrypted_user_data WHERE encrypted_email LIKE '%@gmail.com%';
SELECT user_id, username, encrypted_email FROM encrypted_user_data ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM encrypted_user_data WHERE encrypted_password = 'S3cureP@ssw0rd';
SELECT DISTINCT username FROM encrypted_user_data;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT id, username FROM users WHERE id = 1;
SELECT username, encrypted_data FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT role_id, role_name FROM user_roles ORDER BY role_name DESC;
SELECT username, encrypted_data FROM users WHERE id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT id, username, encrypted_data FROM users WHERE id = 1;
SELECT username, id, encrypted_data FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT username, encrypted_data, id FROM users WHERE encrypted_data IS NOT NULL;
SELECT encrypted_data, username, id FROM users WHERE id > 10;
SELECT role_id, role_name, user_id FROM user_roles WHERE role_name = 'admin';
SELECT * FROM users
SELECT id, username FROM users
SELECT username, password FROM users WHERE id = 1
SELECT * FROM user_data
SELECT user_id, data_type, encrypted_data FROM user_data ORDER BY data_type DESC
SELECT id, username, password FROM users WHERE id = 1;
SELECT username FROM users WHERE id = 2;
SELECT * FROM user_data WHERE data_type = 'personal' ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT u.username, ud.encrypted_data, al.access_time FROM users u JOIN user_data ud ON u.id = ud.user_id JOIN access_logs al ON u.id = al.user_id WHERE u.id = 3;
SELECT u.username, al.access_time, al.action_performed FROM users u LEFT JOIN access_logs al ON u.id = al.user_id WHERE al.action_performed = 'Login' ORDER BY al.access_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_data ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT id, email FROM user_data WHERE id = 3;
SELECT username, email FROM user_data WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM user_logs ORDER BY log_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, encryption_key FROM encryption_keys WHERE user_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM user_data ORDER BY username DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, email FROM user_data WHERE id = 3;
SELECT u.username, l.log_message FROM user_data u JOIN user_logs l ON u.id = l.user_id WHERE l.log_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT u.id, p.password_hash FROM user_data u LEFT JOIN passwords p ON u.id = p.user_id WHERE p.password_salt IS NOT NULL;
SELECT u.username, e.encryption_key FROM user_data u JOIN encryption_keys e ON u.id = e.user_id WHERE LENGTH(e.encryption_key) > 16;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users;
SELECT user_id, encrypted_data FROM user_data WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT address_id, user_id, street, city, postal_code FROM addresses ORDER BY city DESC;
SELECT log_id, user_id, log_message, log_date FROM logs WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT u.username, a.street, a.city FROM users u JOIN addresses a ON u.user_id = a.user_id;
SELECT p.card_number, p.expiration_date, u.username FROM payments p JOIN users u ON p.user_id = u.user_id;
SELECT l.log_id, l.user_id, u.username, l.log_message FROM logs l JOIN users u ON l.user_id = u.user_id;
